title: Eyes log
description: Each entry records results from a standard eye exam.

calendar_date_id.description: YYYYMMDD formatted date of the eye exam.

timestamp.description: HH:MM:SS formatted time of the eye exam.

location_id.description: location where eye exam was given.

person_id.description: the person whose eyes were examined.

right_eye_sphere_d.description: The amount of lens power, measured in diopters (D), prescribed to correct nearsightedness or farsightedness.

right_eye_cylinder.description: Indicates the amount of lens power for astigmatism.

right_eye_axis.description: Describes the lens meridian (1..180) that contains no cylinder power to correct astigmatism.

right_eye_prism_d.description: The amount of prismatic power, measured in prism diopters.

right_eye_add.description: The added magnifying power applied to the bottom part of multifocal lenses to correct presbyopia.

left_eye_sphere_d.description: The amount of lens power, measured in diopters (D), prescribed to correct nearsightedness or farsightedness.

left_eye_cylinder.description: Indicates the amount of lens power for astigmatism.

left_eye_axis.description: Describes the lens meridian (1..180) that contains no cylinder power to correct astigmatism.

left_eye_prism.description: The amount of prismatic power, measured in prism diopters.

left_eye_add.description: The added magnifying power applied to the bottom part of multifocal lenses to correct presbyopia.

pupillary_distance_mm.description: The distance between the centre of one pupil (the central black dot of your eye) to the centre of the other pupil, measured in millimeters.

exam_results_url.description: The scanned copy of the exam results
